resources.string:
"This is the start page for this wiki. Here you can add links to pages that you want to be able to reach easily.
There's also a page called PageFormatting that demonstrates the wiki markup in action. "
"''bold'' //italic// __underlined__ --strikethrough-- >>centered<< *bullet item monospaced (with a space in front) (fs:24)(fs:24) set font size to 24 "
